text:
[Verse]
Floating through the stars
Lost in space tonight
Wonder where you are
In the endless light

[Verse]
Silence all around
Voices echo free
Searching for a sound
In the galaxy

[Chorus]
Lost in space I'm drifting
Waves of stardust lifting
Heart in zero gravity
Will you come and find me

[Verse]
Planets passing by
No more ground to hold
In this cosmic sky
A story yet untold

[Bridge]
Twinkling lights they call
Mysteries so wide
As I start to fall
Come and be my guide

[Chorus]
Lost in space I'm drifting
Waves of stardust lifting
Heart in zero gravity
Will you come and find me
title: Lost in Space
